about_the_game:
Competitive, multiplayer Tower Defense with RPG elements. Upgrade your towers, cast abilities, choose your talents, and outlast your opponents against waves of enemies. May the best strategy win!

Is it better to upgrade your towers, or to use your gold to send creatures to your opponent to increase your income? You decide.

Survive longer than your opponent to win the match! May the best strategy win.

1v1, 2v2, or 1v1v1 matches. Play solo or team up with a Steam friend to extend your strategies!

Every match you will choose a class for your avatar and upgrade talents as you progress through the waves of enemies. Each class alters the behavior of your towers and gives you access to different, limited, abilities.

Fantasy TD Battles is free to play forever with optional cosmetics in the shop. Show off your personality by customizing your avatars with items, pets or TBD effects, some of which can be earned in game.

Features:

  • 1v1, 2v2, or 1v1v1 competitive multiplayer!

  • Send creatures at your opponent to increase your income!

  • Choose a class and upgrade talents during each battle!

  • Upgrade towers to turn the tide of battle!

  • Survive endless waves of enemies. May the best opponent win!

  • Customize your avatar with optional pets, items, and more!
